tagRef.name: Collision Damage
tagRef.tooltip: only set this tag if you want to override the default collision damage values in globals.globals

tagblock.name: Interpolation
tagblock.comment: the damping ratio is c/(2*sqrt(k)). if this ratio is: = 0 : oscillates forever < 1 : oscillates with decreasing amplitude = 1 : reaches the target precisely and quickly (no oscillation) > 1 : reaches the target slowly the higher the value of k, the quicker the system will reach the target value

int32.name: Runtime Interpolator To Object Function Mapping

bit.name: Effect Size Scale From Object Scale

tagblock.name: Multiplayer Object Properties
tagblock.comment: These are respawn zone weights, used only for respawn zones

tagblock.name: Spawn Effects
tagblock.comment: Effect played when an object of this type spawns in during each game mode. Unlike creation effect, it is only played when the object spawns in through certain methods, not whenever one is created.

tagblock.name: Abilities
tagblock.comment: All these fields are additive, meaning a negative number will reduce energy and a positive one will increase energy. Every piece of equipment starts at 1.0 energy

tagblock.name: Stasis Field
tagblock.comment: The effective rate at which time passes for objects in the field. Values below 0.45 screw up jumping.

tagblock.name: Jet Pack

bit.name: Use Camera And Movement For Thrust Dir

tagblock.comment: These apply if 'Use camera and movement for thrust dir' flag is checked

float32.name: Camera Vs Move Input Thrust Control

tagblock.name: Teleporter
tagblock.comment: This causes you to warp forward. It'll trace the path with an effect at the specified speed, then spawn you at the end of it.
If "force along aim vector" isn't checked, the start vector will be your motion vector, plus some amount of weight for where you're looking, if you're moving along your look vector.
If "disable extra probes" isn't checked, we'll do a fan of rays vertically from our central vector, with one probe horizontally on either side of each of those rays.

tagRef.name: Activation While Disabled By Player Traits Sound
